articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate is talking to the media ahead of Tuesday's Euro 2024 Group C match against Slovenia. Watch and follow here.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Watch Gareth Southgate's England news conference ahead of Slovenia match

articles.description: Gary Lineker and Alan Shearer defend their criticism of Harry Kane and England’s performance in their 1-1 Euro 2024 draw with Denmark.
articles.title: Lineker and Shearer defend England criticism after Kane comments

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he will only play at this year's Wimbledon if he can "fight for the title".
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Novak Djokovic will only play if he can 'fight for title'

articles.description: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke must realise that more of the same is not good enough after his side's Euro 2024 exit, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: What now for Clarke and Scotland after early exit?

articles.description: There was "no delay" in treatment to Barnabas Varga by medical staff after the Hungary striker suffered a head injury during his side's 1-0 win over Scotland at Euro 2024, according to Uefa.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'No delay' in treatment time for Varga after head injury, says Uefa

articles.description: South Africa book their place in the T20 World Cup semi-finals with a nervy three-wicket win over co-hosts West Indies in a winner-takes-all Super 8s match.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: South Africa edge past West Indies to make semi-finals

articles.description: South Korea's Amy Yang wins the KPMG Women's PGA Championship by three strokes to claim her first major title.
articles.title: Women's PGA Championship: Amy Yang wins first major
